mapper.insert: insert into board (title as title, content as content, views as views, boardnumber as boardnumber, id as id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{boardnumber}, #{id})
mapper.update: update board set title as title = #title#, content as content= #content# where boardnumber = #boardnumber#
mapper.select: select * from board order by boardnumber
mapper.update: update board set views = #views# WHERE boardnumber=#boardnumber#
